entry.title: MY MAGIC PYTHON STUDYING
entry.content:
HELLO! PYTHON!!!

This is my first time learning python, I heard about this programming code for a long time because as a student who chose Computer Science, I learned vb.net which is less used by people nowadays in the school. Other boys often talk about python, they said python is easier and useful. This winter holiday, finally! Itâ€™s my time to learn python!

Maybe because I learned vb.net before, I found that programming code of python is similar to that of vb.net, including value assignment and other functions, so itâ€™s easier for me to start. Of course, differences exist, I realised that python is much closer to human language than other programming codes. It is more convenient because we donâ€™t need to declare each variables before using them into our code. Python is a language which is very sensible to indenting and strict to code formatting, I always fail to indent correctly and my code cannot be run successfully. FOR EXAMPLE

Since I learned python, I cannot count how many times I saw this error message after clicking RUN buttonğŸ™‚ Sometimes I felt corrupted and entered a dead cycle. (Itâ€™s a real hair loss) Another common mistake is â€œ:â€ Here is an example:

This is my python homework after first class, I felt quite familiar with this shape because I did solve this question in the school. However, it took me much time writing python programming code because of â€œ:â€ My code is shown below:

As you can see, every if statements and for cycle needs colons. I often forget about these little things.ğŸ¤¬ THEN! ERROR MESSAGE COMING AGAIN!

During the class, teacher also taught me another way to solve this question by using while cycle:

I like this question because it looks really interesting if I didnâ€™t learn these syntaxes. I also learned many other amazing things which can even be used in our daily life. I will share them with you next time!ğŸ˜Š

I believe that these problems will disappear someday if I have written enough codes to practice!

entry.title: Say goodbye to the past and Welcome future!
entry.content:
Say goodbye to the past and Welcome future!

Theâ€‚pastâ€‚isâ€‚notâ€‚theâ€‚future,â€‚thereâ€‚isâ€‚noâ€‚failure,â€‚onlyâ€‚temporaryâ€‚cessationâ€‚ofâ€‚success.

  • 2019

    In 2019, I entered the second year of high school(AS). New teachers came, the previous ones left because of various reasons. To be honest, my favourite English teacher left, we were all upset as he said that he would teach us till the end of second year. Although I didnâ€™t do well in the subject he taught, I really like him. Whether seniors or parents said that courses in AS are hard to study, about this, I want to say â€œYES!â€. Actually, I donâ€™t know why, after attending high school, I felt like I am free, no one would spy on me, as a result, I did bad on my grades. At the second year, I found that I couldnâ€™t go on like this, I needed to improve my score. Till now, which is end of my last semester. I can summarize that I am still on the way to success. Just like the introduction, experiences in the past were temporaryâ€‚cessationâ€‚ofâ€‚success, no matter results were, I still need to work hard and improve myself.

  • 2020

    In 2020, I think this year is the most important year in my life. I will attend A-level exams in May and June, which have scores for university reference. Up to now, I only have fewer than 5 months for my preparation, my grades still need to be improved. Application to universities also needs to be prepared well from now on. How busy I will be in 2020. TAT. I hope I can achieve my goal, which is the standard for UCL psychology. The road to a G5 university is not easy. Studying abroad also needs courage. Studying in international department is not as easy as I thought before, I know that my parents have paid a lot of money for me to study and help me achieve my goal, especially my mother, the only one family member supports me to learn psychology in university. When I get low marks in exams, she always feels angry and criticize me, sometimes I feel depressed, I also want to have high scores as she wants. I wonâ€™t have excuses afterwards because both my mother and I have the same goal, I will work harder and make her satisfy. I hope that both she and I will be happy when the scores in summer are published!!!

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
